厽字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厶字部】　厽； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页164第13
【唐韻】力委切【集韻】魯水切，?累上聲。【說文】絫坂土爲牆壁，象形。又【玉篇】七貪切，音驂。尙書以爲參字。

[Subset 2] [The Department of 厶字]　厽; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 164-13
[Tang Yun] Li Weiqi [Ji Yun] Lu Shuiqie, sound tired. [Said the text] The soil in the 絫ban is a wall, pictogram. Also 【Jade articles】Seven greedy and cut, sound and sound. The book is considered to be a reference word.
